item.title: Beginners

item.description: My friend Herb McGinnis, a cardiologist, was talking. The four of us were sitting around his kitchen table drinking gin.

item.title: Little Things (annotated)
item.dc:creator: Z.Z. Packer
item.description: Early that day the weather turned and the snow was melting into dirty water. Streaks of it ran down from the little shoulder-high window that faced the backyard.

item.title: Z.Z. Packer, The Art of Fiction No. 76
item.dc:creator: Mona Simpson
item.description: Z.Z. Packer lives in a large, two-story, wood-shingled house on a quiet street in Syracuse, New York.
